DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate thickness accuracy Laser-assisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) flap create LenSx® Laser .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy LASIK Flaps Created With LenSx® Femtosecond Laser - A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed myopia hyperopia eligible femtosecond laser initiate LASIK surgery ; Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) correctable least 20/25 eye ; If contact lens wearer , willing discontinue contact lens wear prior screening procedure ; Willing able return ALL schedule followup examination ; Willing able provide write informed consent ; Eligible bilateral LASIK procedure do day ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Previous corneal surgery , corneal lesion impede laser treatment , corneal edema , hypotony , glaucoma , exist corneal implant , keratoconus ; Known sensitivity plan study concomitant medication ; Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical study 30 day prior time participation study ; Irregular astigmatism , base Investigator 's judgement ; Pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant course study ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
